title: What are you proud of this season?
body:
As the season is wrapping up I figured it would be fun to share how far each of us have come this season.  My goals this season were to:
1) Reach at least Gold (this is my second season playing ranked.  I climbed from Bronze 4 to Silver 5 0 LP last season.)
2) Get an S rating on as many champions as I could.
3) Get my champion mastery score as high as I could.

I currently have a mastery rating of 335 with level 5 or higher mastery on 17 champions.

I have gotten chests on:
{{champion:103}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:5}} 

I have gotten an S rating on (but didn't have a chest available):
{{champion:84}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:106}} 

And finally, I'm proud to say I just got promoted to Gold and am on pace to possibly make plat by the end of the season.  While I know Gold isn't that high I'm pretty happy that I carried myself all the way from Bronze 3 this season with a decent win rate and KDA dispite not having that much free time to play ranked.
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Randomonium

So what are you proud of this season?

replies.body: I'm proud that I was able to make it back to Plat this season! I was able to get mastery 7 on Nami the first weekend champion mastery 6 + 7 came out, and got 300k+ points on her. :3
Im proud i quit for 9 months over the Morde rework and yet still maintains an active presence on the boards

What Im proud of?

When I made my opinion about balance changes & got rejected because of my Silver account, and then manages to shut/roast most of them by showing my Platinum smurf.

Im proud of my making it back into Silver again and my champion mastery score of 401, with my 1st and only level 7 being my main for over 1 year now Malzahar who I have a 75% winrate with in ranked. One of these days ill get off my ass and get into gold, also one of these days maybe ill get good enough to do that lol. Im proud that I can make Jhin mid work still, and maybe Kled mid but thats a WIP. Im proud that I have chests on:

{{champion:266}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:245}} (AP ekko, none of that tank bs) {{champion:41}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:121}} (got this one a few hours ago in aram) {{champion:203}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:421}}(assassin rek'sai mid) {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} (AP shyvana mid) {{champion:223}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:5}}{{champion:83}}(1st time on new kit) {{champion:26}}.

Im proud of learning Skarner, and champion that I really wanted to learn and i actually really like him. Im proud of having carried a game on Blucian and during that game 1v1ed a tank Akali. Im proud of buying all 20 rune pages and finishing up with owning all the champions in the game, And lastly im proud of buying every champion since Kindred on release, and it looks like it will stay that way for Ivern I have 14307 IP right now lol.

Made it to Gold III in under 60 games, with a 60% win ratio, and still climbing.  Hopefully, with enough time (IRL gets in the way), skill (always learning), and a little luck, I'll end the season as a Plat.  Here's hoping.

My first goal was to reach mid-plat. I managed to get plat 5 and stopped playing ranked all together. I mained jungle and adc to reach it. But after 4 seasons of playing this game and playing every role thoroughly, I've decided I'd start maining Top, and Jungle as secondary. So I stopped playing ranked all together and practice in norms. Turns put my norm mmr is super high and I play most of my games with high plat and diamond. I even get the occasional master/challenger. So that is great practice for season 7. 

My second goal was to unlock all remaining champions. Im missing around 25 right now and I don't see this happening without buying an ip boost since most are 6300 ip and all are over 3150. 

My third goal was to improve my anti-tilt mechanics, and I've got to say I am very happy about the results so far, though I'll admit to being pretty toxic when I go loose. 


Good news is, my gf is leaving on a study trip tomorow so I've got all week-end off work and no one at home. Guess I'll be practicing a good 40 hours.

I'm most proud of making Attack Speed, On-Hit Bard the reason I got to Lvl. 7 with him with over 170K EXP with him, but still manage to be stuck with Bronze. With my luck, the Victorious skin this season will be Bard and I'll never get it.
